meanings.definition: Not having a center or axis.
meanings.sent1: The acentric shape of the cloud caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The artist created an acentric painting with no focal point.
meanings.sent3: The acentric pattern on the shirt made me dizzy.
meanings.sent4: Her acentric personality was like a scattered puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The acentric design of the building was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Lacking a central point or focus.
meanings.sent1: The acentric movie plot confused the audience.
meanings.sent2: Her acentric speech wandered from topic to topic.
meanings.sent3: The acentric party planning led to chaos.
meanings.sent4: His acentric thoughts were like scattered leaves in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The acentric nature of the discussion left everyone puzzled.
